name: LILY (orphic-yokai)
description:
Welcome to Luminous! A small village inhabited by small peaceful golems which are dedicated to planting flowers, herbs and other plants. 

Each golem is unique in its own way, but they are united by one and the same. The energy of the lilies. 

Without the lilies, the golems would fall into a deep sleep and could no longer take care of the plants in the forest.

Lily is a special golem. To be precise, the only one of her kind.

She takes care of the lilies in the village and thus all the energy that is responsible for keeping everything in the forest alive and in time.

One day, however, she wakes up weakened and in complete darkness. Normally the village is shining with energy and joy, but now everything is covered in darkness. 

What happened?

Help Lily to fill up Luminous  with energy again and wake up her friends from  the deep sleep!

Gamepad Controls

Move: Left Stick/X

Jump: Button South

Give Lily to Golem: Left Trigger

Keyboard Controls

Move: A+D/Arrow keys

Jump: Space

Give Lily to Golem: G
